title: Kathmandu, Pokhara & Muktinath-7N/8D
description: Outline Itinerary Day 1: Arrival at Kathmandu Day 2: Kathmandu sightseeing Day 3: Drive to Pokhara and sightseeing Day 4: Drive to Muktinath Day 5: Mu...

itinerary.title: Day 1
itinerary.description:
: Arrival at Kathmandu
                                                        
                                                    
                                                    
                                                        
                                                            Meet up at the arrival and heading towards
Hotel Our office representative will brief you
about the tour activities and transfer to
hotel. Overnight at Hotel.

itinerary.title: Day 2
itinerary.description:
: Kathmandu sightseeing
                                                        
                                                    
                                                    
                                                        
                                                            After Breakfast proceed for the sightseeing
tour of Pasuptinath Temple, Bouddhanath
Stupa After that we will be going to Patan
durbar Square which are the three-world
heritage site of Kathmandu. Overnight at
Kathmandu.

itinerary.title: Day 3
itinerary.description:
: Drive to Pokhara and sightseeing
                                                        
                                                    
                                                    
                                                        
                                                            After Breakfast, Head towards Kathmandu
Which will take around 7 to 8 hours.
(Enroute Manakamana Temple which you
can visit) Overnight at Pokhara.

itinerary.title: Day 4
itinerary.description:
: Drive to Muktinath
                                                        
                                                    
                                                    
                                                        
                                                            After breakfast we will be heading towards
Mustang which will take around 7 to 8
hours experiencing the breathtaking
landscape and enroute Rupse fall visit and
Marpha and at the evening time you can go
for the Muktinath temple aarti.
Overnight at Muktinath.

itinerary.title: Day 5
itinerary.description:
: Muktinath Visit & Drive back to Kathmandu
                                                        
                                                    
                                                    
                                                        
                                                            Early morning visit to Muktinath Temple
and Breakfast at hotel and we will be driving
towards pokhara which will take around 7 to
8 hours.

itinerary.title: Day 6
itinerary.description:
: Pokhara Sightseeing
                                                        
                                                    
                                                    
                                                        
                                                            Breakfast at hotel and we will have full day
sightseeing of Pumdikot, Bindabasini
Temple, Gupteshwor Cave, Davis fall &
International Mountain Musume.
Overnight at Pokhara

itinerary.title: Day 7
itinerary.description:
: Drive back to Kathmandu
                                                        
                                                    
                                                    
                                                        
                                                            Breakfast at hotel and we will be driving
towards kathmandu which will take around 7
to 8 hours and rest free hours for your
shopping at vibrant market of kathmandu.

itinerary.title: Day 8
itinerary.description:
: Departure
                                                        
                                                    
                                                    
                                                        
                                                            After Breakfast, as per you flight time 3
hours prior Proceed to Kathmandu
International Airport for flight back to home
with the memories of Nepal.

booking_info.cancellation_policy: Free cancellation up to 7 days before departure
